home.name: Joaquín Reinante
home.role: Full-Stack Developer · B.S. in Business Administration
home.intro: Business-trained, tech-driven. After graduating in Business Administration, I shifted my career to software development and completed an intensive 700+ hour Full-Stack Bootcamp. I build end-to-end web applications and thrive in fast-paced, collaborative environments—learning quickly, adapting to change, and solving problems with a product mindset.
home.thanks: Thanks for visiting — open to new challenges and collaborations.

labels.technicalSubtitle: Intensive programs and certifications from Hack Academy.

academic.description: Focused on management, marketing, finance, and organizational strategy, with emphasis on leadership and business development.
Diploma in Economics with emphasis on mathematics, accounting, and social sciences.

programs.description: Intensive 3-month program totaling over 700 hours, covering both front-end and back-end development. The course was demanding and challenging, but also highly rewarding and enjoyable. We tackled complex projects, learned a wide range of technologies, and grew significantly as developers through hands-on experience and collaboration.

Course on the fundamentals of AI and machine learning, covering supervised/unsupervised learning, neural networks, and practical applications such as AI logo creation tools, deployment with Vercel, and frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch.

labels.title: Work Experience

description.summary: Completed a 700+ hour Full Stack Developer Bootcamp, building end-to-end applications with React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB and MySQL in agile, team-based projects. In parallel, I studied Artificial Intelligence, learning fundamentals of machine learning, neural networks and practical AI applications. These experiences strengthened my ability to deliver scalable solutions and adapt quickly to new technologies.
responsibilities: Building RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.
Database management with MongoDB and MySQL.

description.summary: Responsible for the preparation of quotations and commercial proposals, as well as prospecting and acquiring new clients to expand the business portfolio.
responsibilities: Ensuring timely payments and strong client relationships.
Preparation and delivery of administrative and technical documentation.

description.summary: Administrative and legal tracking of Microsoft commercial contracts through the ECIF (Enterprise Contract Information Form) platform, ensuring compliance and accuracy throughout the process.
responsibilities: Review and validation of contractual and financial information.
Updating and maintenance of records in internal systems.
Providing support to global teams in various administrative, compliance, and documentation tasks.

description.summary: Hands-on experience in different service and maintenance areas, including cleaning, kitchen hand, construction, and gardening.
skills: Physical endurance and attention to detail.

description.summary: Administrative support for the Wealth Management area, assisting financial advisors in managing client portfolios and ensuring smooth daily operations.
responsibilities: Coordinating meetings and preparing necessary materials.
Assisting in the preparation of client reports and presentations.
